session.speaker: Ganesh Mahalingam
session.bio: Ganesh is a seasoned product leader with a deep passion for solving real-world problems faced by developers and testers. At BrowserStack, he has built flagship products for Cross Browser Testing, Real Device Testing, and Accessibility Testing, which are used by over 5 million people to test and ship quality software with confidence. Having worked with thousands of QA teams over the last decade, Ganesh brings a unique blend of technical insight and user empathy to everything he builds. He lives in New Jersey with his wife and enjoys reading and travelling, always looking for new stories and perspectives.
session.title: Beyond the Hype & Into Action: Accelerating Quality with AI Agents and Unified Test Stack
session.abstract:
While AI continues to dominate the conversation, most testing teams are still grappling with how to turn the hype into real, practical value. That’s the top concern we’ve heard from across our 50,000+ customers.

Over the past two years, we’ve worked closely with thousands of them to solve the actual problems of AI adoption. The result? A 10x boost in productivity, a 50% jump in coverage, and a 40% reduction in build failures  —all through practical, targeted applications of AI where it matters most.

In this session, I’ll walk you through how leading teams at companies like GM, PayPal, and L’Oréal are using AI agents and BrowserStack’s Unified Test Stack to drive measurable results. You’ll see live demos across key use cases—like instant test generation, intelligent test selection, visual testing, and low-code automation—plus real benchmarks comparing AI-driven workflows with manual efforts and generic LLMs like ChatGPT.

If you’re a QA leader, developer, or tester looking to deliver quality at scale, this session will give you a clear, practical view into what’s working—and how to stay ahead as testing enters the AI era.
